apiClassifier.shortdesc: Options for a cloud document text recognizer.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Options for a cloud document text recognizer.

apiValue.shortdesc: API key to use for Cloud Vision API.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: API key to use for Cloud Vision API. If `null`, the default API key from FirebaseApp will be used.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of hinted language codes for cloud document text recognition.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of hinted language codes for cloud document text recognition. The default is `nil`. See https://cloud.google.com/vision/docs/languages for supported language codes.

apiValue.shortdesc: The BCP-47 language code, such as, "en-US" or "sr-Latn".

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The BCP-47 language code, such as, "en-US" or "sr-Latn". For more information, see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unicode_locale_identifier.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A document text symbol recognized in an image.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A document text symbol recognized in an image.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized document text symbol.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized document text symbol.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the document text symbol relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the document text symbol relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: The recognized start or end of the document text symbol.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The recognized start or end of the document text symbol.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text symbol.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text symbol. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the document text symbol that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the document text symbol that was recognized.

apiValue.shortdesc: Hyphen break type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Hyphen break type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Line break that ends a paragraph.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Line break that ends a paragraph.

apiValue.shortdesc: Line-wrapping break type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Line-wrapping break type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Space break type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Space break type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sure space break type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Sure space break type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Unknown break type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Unknown break type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether the break prepends the text element.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether the break prepends the text element. If `false`, the break comes after the text element.

apiValue.shortdesc: The recognized text break type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The recognized text break type.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A document text word recognized in an image that consists of an array of symbols.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A document text word recognized in an image that consists of an array of symbols.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized document text word.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized document text word.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the document text word relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the document text word relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: The recognized start or end of the document text word.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The recognized start or end of the document text word.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text word.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text word. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the document text word that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the document text word that was recognized.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of symbols in the document text word.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of symbols in the document text word.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Recognized document text in an image.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Recognized document text in an image.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Disposes the native code associated with this DocumentText.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Disposes the native code associated with this DocumentText.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the recognized document text.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the recognized document text.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of blocks recognized in the document text.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of blocks recognized in the document text.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A document text paragraph recognized in an image that consists of an array of words.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A document text paragraph recognized in an image that consists of an array of words.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized document text paragraph.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized document text paragraph.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the document text paragraph relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the document text paragraph relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: The recognized start or end of the document text paragraph.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The recognized start or end of the document text paragraph.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text paragraph.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text paragraph. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the document text paragraph that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the document text paragraph that was recognized.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of words in the document text paragraph.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of words in the document text paragraph.

apiValue.shortdesc: Barcode document text block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Barcode document text block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Image document text block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Image document text block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Horizontal/vertical line box document text block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Horizontal/vertical line box document text block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Table document text block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Table document text block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Regular document text block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Regular document text block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: Unknown document text block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Unknown document text block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized document text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized document text block.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the document text block relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the document text block relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: The recognized start or end of the document text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The recognized start or end of the document text block.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the document text block. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the document text block that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the document text block that was recognized.

apiValue.shortdesc: The detected block type.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The detected block type.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of paragraphs in the block if the type is `DocumentBlockType.text`.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of paragraphs in the block if the type is `DocumentBlockType.text`. Otherwise, the array is empty.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Initializes a VisionImage object with the given image.

apiParam.apiDesc: BitmapData to use in vision detection. The given image should be rotated, so its orientation up. Set to null if using the path param.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Initializes a VisionImage object with the given image.
